name: Be Quiet!: Act One
description: Go through the story of Be Quiet! and begin with Act 1 where you start in a forest at a house

name: Invaders
description: This game is a 3d Tower Defense created by a highschooler. It was developed by Unity and was accompanied by a lot of youtube tutorials.

name: The Disappearing of Gensokyo: Kogasa, Iku Character Pack
description: This pack will add Nagae Iku and Tatara Kogasa to the game.

name: Paper Dolls 2: Escape
description: Ghosts and spirits will prowl the mansion on All Hallows' Eve! Within the new game mode you will act as an exorcist, slaying spirits aplenty! Make sure to explode each wine jar at the opportune moment to blow up as many enemies as possible.

developers.name: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

name: Wheels
description: Sin descripción

name: Antigraviator: Viper Trails
description: This DLC introduces you to some very exciting new race tracks built in the forest of the Orval planet system, known as the Viper Trails. Strap yourself into your new Venom Class Grav and be the victor!

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Summer Vibes
description: Summer Vibes is HORIZON CHASE TURBO first DLC. Featuring the most classic arcades roadster, you'll love to put your sunglasses and feel every mile of this warm coast to coast experience.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Rookie Series
description: A new campaign tailored for new players. Bring your friends and family together into ROOKIE SERIES!

name: Space Battle Arena
description: Space fight arena is a retro arcade based arena shooter game that was modeled after legendary arcade games. This game retains the fun, addicting aspects of those arcade games while also adding on new, awesome features such as challenges, skins, and a world wide leaderboard.

name: Railroad X: Car-set Porsche and Mercedes
description: This set consists of an assortment of Porsche 911 and Mercedes Benz 220D models.The original Porsche 911 (pronounced nine eleven, German: Neunelfer) was a luxury sports car made by Porsche AG of Stuttgart, Germany. The famous, distinctive, and durable design was introduced in autumn 1963 and built through 1989.

name: City of God I: Prison Empire - Outrage
description: Outrage have 5 new gangster persioner into your prison.

name: Cronicas de Landulph
description: 10 anos se passaram depois que o Deus Maligno Cruel foi derrotado, o mundo deveia agora viver em paz. O Grande Órion foi responsabilizado pelos crimes de Cruel e sumiu junto com os Shadowrunners. Sem os salvadores do mundo, cabe a você salvar o mundo.

name: Beyond the Thaw
description: You are a Max Gilbert, a former military doctor. While taking a trip to your usual place of stay, the next moment you find yourself alone in the middle of nowhere, fighting fierce cold and facing series of trials. What is it: reality or mind games, behind which lies your deep secret?

name: How to Survive: Barricade!
description: So, you decided to settle down did you?That’s great but let’s see how long can you survive...Spend your days searching for resources and materials to create obstacles, barricades and traps to defend the occupants of your camp from the hordes of night flesh-hungry monsters.Learn to craft obstacles, barricades and traps!

name: FutureKreate
description: This Robot Simulator is a cutting-edge robot simulator developed by a robotics researcher. You can experience the state-of-arts robotics development with this simulator. Experiment with your robot in the town, mountains, oceans, and the skies at various times!

name: For Honor: Warmonger Hero
description: Prey on the weak as a Warmonger, new playable Hero. Strike and impale with the Flamberge, a legendary two-handed sword!

name: For Honor: Kyoshin Hero
description: Become a Kyoshin, a mystical Samurai whose elegance and prowess will leave everyone in awe on the battlefield.

name: For Honor: Gryphon Hero
description: A well-known veteran has returned! Wield the mighty Bardiche as Gryphon, a new playable hero.

name: Elemental Heroes: Blue Fighter 20th Level Set
description: Blue Fighter Set of 20th level with random parameters for Elemental Heroes

name: Infini: #InfiniPrison
description: Ignite your jetpack and propel yourself through a challenging time-attack level. Share your score with the community using #InfiniPrison!

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: New Japan Pro-Wrestling 2018 Wrestler Pack
description: Usher in a new era to the Fire Pro ring with additional New Japan Pro-Wrestling talent!

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: World Wonder Ring Stardom Collaboration
description: Stardom, Japan's leading women's professional wrestling promotion, join the Fire Pro ring with 10 new wrestlers, including their signature moves, costumes, entrance themes, and voices! Believe now, shine tomorrow! We are stardom!

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: Yoshihiro Takayama Charity DLC Part 2
description: Add rings, logos and T-shirts representing legendary Japanese pro-wrestler and MMA combatant Yoshihiro Takayama with this Edit Part DLC.

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: Fighting Road - Champion Road Beyond
description:
Wrestler Morio Sumisu’s life ended in tragedy at the height of his career. Now his son has set out on the same path of glory, but can he find a way to the top without following in his father’s haunted footsteps?

Scenario writer SUDA51 returns to the Fire Pro ring for the sequel to his infamous Champion Road scenario that launched his career 26 years ago.

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: Entrance Craft
description: Set the tone of the match before you even step in the ring with this entrance sequence editor! Customize your entrance outfit, pre-match taunts, venue lighting and effects, and more!

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: World Wonder Ring Stardom Collaboration Part 2
description: Stardom, Japan's leading women's professional wrestling promotion, are back with 11 new wrestlers, including their signature moves, costumes, entrance themes, and voices!

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: Fighting Road - 2017 NJPW Junior Heavyweight Championship
description: You never forgot the excitement you felt when your father showed you your first junior heavyweight match... Now you step into the NJPW dojo to realize your childhood dream of becoming the best junior heavyweight the world has ever seen!

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: New Japan Pro-Wrestling Collaboration
description: NJPW, Japan’s premiere pro-wrestling promotion, joins the roster! Battle alongside and against your favorites in the all-new Fighting Road scenario mode.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - New Quest 'Where the Cat and Wolf Play...'
description: Explore a forgotten village and discover its terrifying secret. Find out who or what slaughtered its inhabitants and use all your witcher skills to confront this mysterious force.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - New Quest 'Fool's Gold'
description: Geralt and a village idiot team up to learn the secret of an abandoned village inhabited entirely by pigs.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - New Quest 'Contract: Missing Miners'
description: Miners from a small Skellige village are disappearing. Investigate and find out what's happening!

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - For the Gods
description:
Delve deeper into the mystical lore of the Northland with 3 new heroic questlines in "For the Gods" the first DLC for Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny.
You've been entrusted by a nobleman from Clanegh with the difficult task of transforming the paramour of a Thorwalian leader's daughter into a worthy suitor.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - Ogredeath
description: Your quests through the legendary saga of the Northland continue in "Ogredeath" the latest DLC for Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny. Search for a missing member of Aventuria's elite messenger team. Join a band of huntsmen as you brave the legendary beasts of Torkil's Chasm and navigate the exacting currents of the Great Bodir River.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Norse Dragons
description: Norse Dragons is the third free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon. Dedicated to the Scandinavian coalition, it features more than 60 new units for Sweden, Denmark & Norway. Effectively propelling this coalition as well as the individual countries into the early 90's era, it will bring them onto an equal footing with the other nations.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Second Korean War
description: Second Korean War is Wargame: Red Dragon’s second free DLC. It features a new solo campaign, set in an uchronical 1992 where the previous year's coup against Mikhaïl Gorbatchev has succeeded. The Party's old guard has restored Soviet order, getting closer to its Asian communist neighbors in the process, but is set on a confrontation..

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Nation Pack: Netherlands
description: Wargame is back again with a brand new DLC for the million-selling franchise's third instalment, Wargame Red Dragon. In this new expansion for the spectacular real-time strategy game from Eugen Systems, the unique and diverse Dutch units are finally playable! Choose between 80 units and enter into a coalition with West Germany.

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - The Millionth Mile
description: The Millionth Mile is the first free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon. Focusing on the Eastern Bloc coalition, it will feature more than 60 new units for Poland, Czechoslovakia & East-Germany, bringing them in the 90's and on an equal footing with Wargame: Red Dragon's main nations.

name: The Message
description: First person shooter in setting of 80th years. You need to kill everyone in the house. Use guns on levels, be fast and kill without doubt.

name: Aurora
description: This visually rich cinematic animated VR short follows the lives of a young family and all who inhabit it’s vividly coloured landscape. “AURORA” draws the viewer into the emotive storyline by allowing them to get up close and personal with the characters.

name: Night of Full Moon: The Red Hood Diary
description: Laid in the corner, cobwebbed and dusty, Who picked up the diary, broke the seal of memory? Thank you, Mister Carpenter, Let’s begin, the castle adventure.

name: Night of Full Moon: Gear of Fate
description: The machine gave me a second life.When she was born,She was judged by a doctor that she would not survive a year due to cardiacdysplasia.At the insistence of her mother,the mechanical magician replaced her with a mechanical heart.After growing up,She seems to have a special connection with machinery

name: Night of Full Moon: Apothecary's Blessing
description: “My potion, heals good, kills evil” Little Red Riding Hood has been filled with curiosity for the natural world ever since childhood, and enjoys performing strange experiments. To care for her aging Grandma, she secretly learned how to concoct cheap potions from the crazy apothecary.

name: Night of Full Moon: Choice of Carpenter
description: Little Carpenter was fond of the Little Red Riding Hood who lived near the gate of village. He always played with her after work done. Seeing Little Red Riding Hood was so happy, Carpenter almost spoke out his love but he didn’t. Because there was always a secret only known by himself.

name: Night of Full Moon: Magic Curtain
description: As a descendant of the Hope family Little Red Riding Hood discovered a strange bond between her body and cards when she was very young. She sought to cover up this supernatural phenomenon and magic became her best excuse.

name: Night of Full Moon: Contract of Soul
description: Little Red Riding Hood becomes silent these days. She speaks less in public, but likes talking to herself. "Ninety-ninth soul..." Little Red murmuring. With but one more soul, she will complete the contract with the Reaper. However, to find the one last soul is more difficult than she could have imagined...

name: Kalpa
description:
Space travel theme top-down rhythm game.
Beatiful girl Kalpa perform, recover and travel space with her various instruments.

name: Snake
description: Play the classic that transcends generations.

name: Raindrops
description: Raindrops is a stereo rhythm game, played with your mouse. Notes will be poured from both sides, and the sound will wave towards the direction of succesful hits. Move your mouse, click with both buttons, even scroll to take care of these notes.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Williams
description: Located in California, Lake Williams is surrounded by a stunning backdrop of dry arid land and forest-covered steep hills.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lough Kerr
description: Lough Kerr is a perfectly formed, historic venue found in Ireland where anglers flock to try and catch a national bream record with the biggest being an incredible 21lbs. The lough also contains good sized carp, tench, roach and rudd.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Dylan
description: Located in Minnesota, Lake Dylan is over 2000 acres with 11 different species of fish to target. As well as containing trophy sized bass, this lake also contains giant Muskie, Tiger Muskie and Longnose Gar with the Muskie growing to a huge 53lbs.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Jezioro Bestii
description: Jezioro Bestii or ‘Lake of the Beast’, a scenic lake in the mountains of Poland, is famous for its predators including pike to over 50lbs, zander to over 20lbs and catfish to 85lbs. With 13 different species to catch and 25 boss fish to successfully land, this lake will be a unique challenge.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Talon Fishery
description: Talon Fishery is the epitome of a pleasure fishing complex and gives you four separate lakes in one venue. Each contain their own stock of fish and species and are perfect for honing your match and float fishing skills.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Bass Pro Shops Equipment Pack
description: This MEGA equipment pack contains all 316 items from the Bass Pro Shops edition of Fishing Sim World. It contains the best products that Bass Pro Shops produce, as well as boats from Tracker and Nitro and engines from Mercury.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lago Del Mundo
description: Based in Andalucia, Spain, Lago del mundo (Lake of the World) is the first venue to offer fishing from static pegs around the lake as well as from a brand-new rigid inflatable boat. With catfish to 200lbs, huge largemouth (black bass), carp, pike, zander and roach, there is something for everyone!

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Tackle Box Equipment Pack
description: This 50 item pack contains equipment that is perfect for all the styles of fishing available in game and will help you combat any situation you may face! With a brand new boat, rods, reels, lures and clothing there really is everything to set up your perfect in-game tackle box.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Laguna Iquitos
description: Laguna Iquitos, in the heart of the rainforests of Peru adds two new species of fish - the beautiful peacock bass and terrifying giant wolf fish as well as a new style of boat, a kayak. Also catch huge arapaima, black pacu and red tail catfish.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Arnold
description: The habitation around Lake Arnold in Tennessee provides a range of fishing opportunities for the ten different species found here.

name: Fishing Sim World: Bass Pro Shops Edition
description: Fully endorsed by Bass Pro Shops and featuring an array of your favourite Bass Pro Shops equipment. Choose from 8 glorious US locations from Fishing Sim World and compete in career mode or play your way in multiplayer. An underwater camera will allow you to see the moment the fish strikes lure!

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Lake Nelson
description: Lake Nelson is a picturesque fishing venue located in the heart of Texas. Fish for 15 different species including bass to 15lbs, as well as enter three different tournaments and three new career events with 25 new Boss Fish to hunt down and catch.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Trophy Hunter's Equipment Pack
description: This 30+ item, licensed equipment pack contains all the additional equipment you need to land the biggest trophy fish available in Fishing Sim World.

name: The Black Watchmen: Alone in the Dark Web
description: In the Alone in the Dark Web DLC, you'll need to complete an all new in-client mission that brings you to the brink of the dark web - and insanity. Investigate the hidden secrets behind an occult website to discover the ultimate truths.

name: The Black Watchmen: Mother Russia
description: In the Mother Russia DLC, you'll need to complete an all new in-client mission set that brings you through the cold case files of Agent Msika and the circumstances surrounding her disappearance. Investigate the dark truths behind secret Soviet weapons programs and their modern day counterparts.

name: The Black Watchmen: Season 2 - Enduring Conflict
description: In Season 2 of The Black Watchmen you have been assigned to investigate the aftermath of the Abyss Incident. Get ready for a new set of missions, mini-games and puzzles where you'll battle against rival groups that wish to keep this advanced paranormal research to themselves.

name: The Black Watchmen: Whitechapel
description: Rumors have emerged suggesting the return of one of the Agency's most dangerous enemies. Where he goes, mayhem surely follows...

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Dead Ends
description: Step lively as more of Harry's friends join you in this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! Includes two new character decks — JARED KINCAID and MORTIMER LINDQUIST — and two new book decks — CHANGES and GHOST STORY.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Wardens Attack
description:
WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK!
The White Council’s grey cloaks, the Wardens, join the fray in this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! This expansion includes two new character decks—Carlos Ramirez and Anastasia Luccio—and two new book decks—Small Favor and Turn Coat.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Ra Crossover
description:
A crossover with Greater Than Games' Sentinels Comics universe and its game Sentinels of the Multiverse!
The sun god Ra steps into a new avatar in the Dresdenverse with this fully playable character deck. When one supernatural fire-slinger isn't enough, it's time to call down the flames!

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Helping Hands
description:
NEED A HAND?
You’re in luck as more of Harry’s friends join you in this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! This expansion includes two new character decks—Sanya and Molly Carpenter—and two new book decks—Proven Guilty and White Night.

name: Futuclass: Hydrogen & Oxygen
description: Learn about Oxygen and Hydrogen in two lab experiments. See gas molecules with your naked eye and use the properties of gases to light a candle. Combine most active metals with an acid to produce enough hydrogen to launch a rocket. Answer in-game questions to capture the learning.

name: Futuclass: Oxygen Escape Room
description: Escape the room using your chemistry knowledge! Explore the clues lying around. Clear up the poisonous gas blocking your exit. Turn a toxic combustion reaction into a regular combustion reaction. Heat up different liquids to obtain the needed molecules.

name: March of War: StormSiege
description: StormSiege is a free Single-Player expansion for the Massively-Multiplayer Online Turn-Based Strategy game March of War. It contains three missions, released sequentially. Currently, only the first mission, Beachhead, is available. The remaining two will be released in the coming weeks.

name: Femboy Bangers: Pub & Grill
description: Your visit to Femboy Bangers turns into a memorable encounter with various employees, eager to please. Read through an exciting story as well as some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. * Don't forget to tip your waiter!

name: Bird
description: Meet Bird, a relaxing third-person bird simulator. Your goal is simple - follow the circles and avoid any terrain obstacles, because they can hurt the bird or worse, cripple!

name: The Surfeit: Episode 1
description: Control the fate of Planet Naizyr, in this four-part Adult science fiction drama! Your choices change the events of this visual novel. Broker peace, instigate war, incite romance or ruin friendships. You are change and change is coming.

name: Jungle Town: Birthday quest
description: A cognitive game for children from 2 to 5 years old, which teaches different life skills, contains tasks for attentiveness and fine motor skills. The plot is based on the birthday of the baby elephant, his friends prepare gifts with their own hands, and in the finale they go to a festive party.

name: End of the World: VR
description: Your purpose is to make her fall into your sex desires. You need input direction to move to get some objects and props, avoid the bite of the zombie, play the mini game to get the point. Use your stick to open her legs at last!

name: New Yankee: Under the Genie's Thumb
description: A genie in a lamp demands a pair of time-tripping heroes make his wishes come true in this all-new adventure starring the mighty Sir John and the magical Lady Mary!

name: G-Mode Archives 17: Flyhight Cloudia III
description: The thoughts reflected in the distant sky are the ties that bind a new world... Here and now, all the mysteries will be revealed.

name: Soukou Akki Muramasa: Janen-hen
description: The official anthology DVD of Soukou Akki Muramasa, which includes sidestories written by guest scenario writers, wallpapers, Twitter icons and backgrounds, new songs by Ono Masatoshi and and much more.

name: Gunslingers of the Wasteland vs. The Zombies from Mars
description: Do battle across the American Southwest in this This Third-Person Shooter as you contend with the evil Dr. Arcturis and his legion of undead.

name: Ancient Evil
description: ANCIENT EVIL is a real-time tactical puzzle game where you need to pass severe tests and win the final battle with the enemy.

name: XXZ: XXL - Dead Souls Trial
description: A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: XXZ: XXL - Rush
description: A nurse and a security officer working at the hospital are trying to escape from the city invaded by Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: XXZ: XXL - Squad Trial
description: A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.

name: XXZ: XXL - Squad
description: A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.

name: Ancient Frontier: The Crew
description: Ancient Frontier - The Crew DLC adds brave men and women from all walks of Frontier life that are ready to serve you, Commander. Crew members gain experience and offer a variety of bonuses to the ships they pilot.

name: Ancient Frontier: Quests & Events
description: Ancient Frontier - Quests & Events DLC adds two new features to the game. Quests are contracts that can be completed as you play through the game. Random Events will occur throughout a campaign, and the result will depend on the choices you make.

name: Flute Master: Trick or Treat
description: Flute Master "Trick or Treat" DLC pack features 3 new original songs Catch the Ghost, Spooky Mike and Vlady Party. Prepare that fright with your recorder.

name: Flute Master: Epic Christmas
description: Flute Master "Epic Christmas" DLC pack features 3 new rock editings of classical tracks Away in a Manger, Jingle Bells and Silent Night. Prepare to rock on with your recorder.

name: Rocketbirds 2: Rescue Bundle
description: Get the bundle and upgrade your Rescue Mode missions! Get all Hardboiled Chicken's Story Mode costumes, bullet blocking shields, chainsaws and boxing gloves. You can also rent the Master Duck himself! New items and the Master Duck are only available in this bundle!

name: Rocketbirds 2: Mind Control
description: Albatropolis has been freed and Big G and Putzki Jr are running for president! Who will win? Who will cheat? This DLC features new politician costumes, playable characters, new Dojo Debate Rooms; and the all new Assimilator Gun for Mind Controlling your victims during your Rescue Missions!

name: Timeline Traveler II: Dream
description: Timeline Traveler II is a puzzle game that combined time control and platformer element together to provide a new game experience!

name: Rope Cow: Rope it to The Cow
description: Rope swing like never before.

name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal: Advanced Fog of War in the Pacific
description: Advanced Fog of War in the PacificThis paid module offers more suspense as enemy losses, and the score remains uncertain until the end.

name: Blackhole: Challenge Vault
description: Take everything you have experienced to the next level! Enter the Challenge Vault, a special simulation for Endera agents, and participate with others in a secret training protocol. Select your favourite character and beat the records set by other players in this brand new online mode.

name: Blackhole: Testing Laboratory
description: Our hero just signed up for the Endera's suicide mission, but he wants to be captain of the mission. What really happens and why he ended up as the coffee-guy? Try to uncover this secret!

name: Ascending: Dojo
description: In this VR-RPG you can bend the elements and use other mystical abilities to face every challenge.

name: Spaceland: Cooperative
description: Meet the new DLC with a cooperatative story campaign. In this prequel to the main plot you will learn about Jim's way from an Academy graduate to an active officer of Space Rangers.

name: Laguna Racer
description: An arcade racing game from Midway.

name: Shuffleboard
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Walk
description: A clone of Circus, in this variant it is not clowns but astronauts bouncing on a see-saw in order to collect items up in the air.

name: The Loop
description: A lonely writer wakes up in the middle of the night. He doesn't feel like he's about to fall back asleep, so he gets up to have a drink. Something doesn't feel quite right, though. What he doesn't know is that he's in a loop, stuck forever in an endless loop of the same mundane events at the hands of a mysterious ghastly clown figure. But not everything is as it seems. There are clues, riddles scattered around the false world of this insane dream, and it's up to you to guide the protagonist into solving the puzzles laid out before him and escape from the loop!

name: The Question
description: Sylvie has been your friend ever since you were children. But now, at the university, you need to ask her a question. This is a very small game made to teach others to work with the Ren'Py engine, and is available as a standalone download.

name: Night at the Hospital
description: Night at the Hospital is Team Snugglebunny’s visual novel entry for the Pulse Pounding Heart Stopping Dating Sim Jam of 2013. The first release was made in 5 days. Meet Steve. Steve is a ghost hunter. This is not the story of Steve. This is the story of Frank. Frank and Steve have been best friends since middle school. When Steve gets in a bind, Frank bails him out. As far as Frank is concerned, tonight’s little foray into the abandoned hospital is just business as usual. That is until he meets Luka. This is the epic tale of Frank, conspiracies, cuddling, and some sweet, sweet mysterious stranger lovin’.

name: Biorhythm
description: Sin descripción

name: Solar Conqueror
description: Top down space shooter

name: Cosmic Raiders
description: Cosmic Raiders is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up where the player's space ship can move both left and right and there is also a radar showing the locations of enemies. In every level four bombs are dropped along with a number of fighters to ensure the bombs reach the surface of the planet. The objective of the game is simply to clear all the enemies and get the highest score possible. For every two bombs destroyed an energy star that the player can collect will appear. By picking it up the player's ship is energized with an invincible energy shield. Once all enemies have been cleared from one level the game moves on to the next.

name: Hidden Words
description: Hidden Words is an interactive word guessing game that can be played with your Twitch chat! Your viewers will try to find the hidden words in a picture by just typing to your chat. There is also a solo game mode to challange yourself.

name: PC_001
description: Escape the Tower.

name: Ha_Bits
description: Ha_Bits is an Adventure and platformer game for windows and Mac OS with a neo-noir cyberpunk setting.

name: Pots and Potions
description: A game about crafting potions with the craziest effects against the clock (and your mates).

name: Groaning Steel
description: A horror racing game.

name: Zookeeper World
description: Zookeeper is a action-puzzle game where you need to get through a variety of puzzles and collect coins to fill your zoo with cute animals, plants and more. As you complete requests from these visitors as well as the Boss, your zoo rank will increase. Before long, you'll be expanding and customizing your zoo with various designs and decorations! With endless ways to spice things up, there’s never a dull moment as a zookeeper!

name: Surgical Robot Simulator
description: A real surgical robot simulation game, observe human organs from the inside of the abdominal cavity, and use various instruments to grasp, cut and clip the organs freely to complete the real operation. Be careful not to bleed. Challenge to complete all levels from simple to difficult

name: Follow The Cat
description: "Follow The Cat" is a single-player first-person physics-based puzzler. You make your path through story, manipulating shapes and solving physics-based challenges set in visually designed places.

name: The Market of Light
description: A short game and tech demo created with Unreal Engine 5. The player is a small firefly that collects orbs of light scattered around the market. Experience a meticulously rendered world from a micro view point!

name: Selfmade Devil
description: Selfmade Devil is a casual semi-paced casual game with a rich variety of magic objects, enemies, and maps. Play as the demon king in the mysterious girl under the guidance of the cultivation of magic ability, transformation of the demon king city. Improve the efficiency of material acquisition to create a powerful demon king army to invade human territory!

name: The Forgotten Phobia
description: The Forgotten Phobia is a horror puzzle game made in 2D pixel graphics.

name: Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout
description: Guide Lenny Loosejocks as he goes Walkabout in the Australian outback. It's the groundbreaking original Lenny Loosejocks web adventure in all its pixelated glory - exactly like you remember playing when you got home from school in 1997.

name: Spookity Hollow
description: Spookity Hollow is a ghastly third-person sandbox game created for young children (Ages 4+) which encourages curiosity and role-play.

name: Captures II
description: A chess-based puzzle game.

name: Knight and Princess
description: The legend says "Only the most skillful players can beat the dragon" so I challenge you, are you the true Knight?Take up the challenge and save the Princess.

name: Dance of Cubes
description: A casual logic puzzle in the style of cellular automata. Features a 3D top down view and casual music. The objective is to place automaton cubes, hit play and by simulation of the cubes crush all the glass mushrooms.

name: Mary Knots: Garden Wedding
description: Mary is a a truly inspired Wedding Planner. Help Mary restore and decorate the garden! Buy garden decorations to make it the perfect wedding location. Mary Knots features Hidden Object scenes, Match3 minigames and lots of decoration fun! Come, help Mary make her dreams come true!

name: ReturnHome
description: ReturnHome is a puzzle adventure game.You will become the hero to pass through 5 themes, "City of Fire", "North of the Desert","Land of Strife", "Land of Fish and Rice", "City of Wealthy", find out the security of your origins after many obstacles.

name: Hot and Lovely 4
description: A very interesting puzzle game. You need to remember the different pictures by flipping the cards, and find the same pictures to eliminate.

name: Hidden Objects: Cartoon Fantasy
description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Hidden Objects - Cartoon Fantasy, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games.

name: Tomb Rumble: Cursed Vampire
description: The curse of the Vampire falls upon you Succumb to a mysterious cloaked figure's bit and reincarnate as a vengeful but classy Vampire!

name: Tomb Rumble: Cursed Sorcerer
description: The curse of the Sorcerer falls upon you: Reincarnate as a sparkling Sorcerer and get your revenge on other adventurers by unleashing deadly spells! Ranging from mobility to cosmetic or offensive spells, the sorcerer is a careful but polyvalent curse!

name: Plague Inc: The Cure
description: Can you save the world? Take control and stop a deadly global pandemic by any means necessary in Plague Inc.'s biggest expansion yet!

name: Unit 4: Clash of Agents
description:
Unit 4 galaxy expands with new adrenalinic contents! Enjoy three new competitive couch challenges with your friends:

- The frantic coin arena of NESTIWAL
- The deadly caged fights of NOXIOS IV

name: Drop-Drop
description:
Drop-Drop is a puzzle arcade game, probably inspired by Tetris and Columns.

There is a rectangular playfield. Various blocks appear slowly from the top. If one of the columns would reach the bottom, the game is over.

The player has a cursor at the bottom which can be used to select a particular column, pull blocks into that cursor the bottom, move the cursor to a different column and push the blocks back to the top. Multiple blocks can be moved at once, but they have to be the same type. As soon as the column of at least 5 blocks of the same type gathers together, this group annihilates, freeing up space on the playfield, thus making it possible to continue the game.

Drop-Drop was initially developed and published in Russia; the only known names attached to the project are programmers Vladimir Ryshov and Grigory Sragovich. The game was included in the Moscow Nights game compilation, which released in (at the very least) the United Kingdom and Germany.

Data East learned of Moscow Knights and obtained a license for Drop-Drop, using it as the basis of what would eventually be known as Magical Drop. Both the first Magical Drop and Magical Drop II state that the gameplay was licensed from Russ Ltd, and Japanese materials for the first Magical Drop and its ports play up the game's status as a Russian puzzle game. At some point, Data East would purchase the full rights to the game from Russ; this is likely the reason why Russ is not credited in Magical Drop III or beyond.

name: Magical Drop
description:
Magical Drop is a 1995 competitive arcade puzzle game created by Data East Corporation. It is the inaugural game of the Magical Drop series. Magical Drop is based on a game called Drop-Drop created by Russ Ltd, a Russian company.

The arcade game received an updated version named Magical Drop Plus 1! that features aesthetic improvements and also introduces a "Solo Play" mode. Magical Drop Plus 1! was released in North America and Europe as Chain Reaction; in this version, the puzzle pieces are changed from spherical Drops to various items (such as food or celestial bodies) and the character-unique voice acting is replaced by a single male narrator.

All versions of the original arcade game were developed for Data East's "MLC" arcade hardware.
